Title: When the Guns Come Out
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Nichelle D. Tramble (teleplay by), Dave Andron (teleplay by), Nichelle D. Tramble (story), Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Nichelle D. Tramble (executive story editor), Ingrid Escajeda (story), Ryan Farley (story), Jon Worley (story)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan tries to find Winona after she leaves him, Boyd tries to find out who hit his crew's oxy clinic, and Quarles takes an interest in Raylan after he finds out that he has been asking questions about him.
